name: Escape Space (itch)
description: Introducing a brand new turn-based strategy puzzle game. Filled with dangerous space encounters, it's up to you to manoeuvre your ship into safety! Outnumbered and outgunned, the only chance to escape is striking key enemies and manipulating your positioning. With a focus on forward thinking and pattern recognition, you will face a variety of enemy types and different ways to escape each encounter. All of this is brought together in a stunning interstellar setting with a captivating soundtrack and jaw dropping explosions!
